channel.title: Why wont my edgewood destroying dragon appear?(PI)
channel.description: Hey guys im trying to spawn a dragon in edge, just for fun im kinda bored, but it wont spawn ive tabbed and everything, it compiles, and I get no server error. here is the dragon line: [code=java]spawn = 54 3987 3503 0 1 40 200 550 Dragon[/code]

item.title: Why wont my edgewood destroying dragon appear?(PI)
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

Yeah I know… im just experimenting with the different values.

Read full topic
item.source: Why wont my edgewood destroying dragon appear?(PI)

item.title: Why wont my edgewood destroying dragon appear?(PI)
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“tyyy9, post:11, topic:407428”][quote author=mrpyro3 link=topic=508714.msg3690665#msg3690665 date=1312096218]

its edge, but maybe I hit a dead spot i will try to adjust it brb.

Try the coords (3087, 3492)
[/quote]
yes it was a typo on my side thanks for pointing that out tho, now time to go kill it over and over agian,(Im really bored)

EDIT:lol its a lvl 221… I cant kill it! im only a lvl 126 this sucks![/quote]
Sometimes you can change the npc level.

Read full topic

item.title: Why wont my edgewood destroying dragon appear?(PI)
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“tyyy9, post:7, topic:407428”]Ok, both of you shut up… so we can tlk bout what your here to tlk bout, thanks, oh and I only have one spawn-config file here ill post the whole section of the file where i posted it:

//edge spawns spawn = 1282 3084 3487 0 0 0 0 0 SALESMAN spawn = 541 3094 3499 0 0 0 0 0 Zeke spawn = 461 3097 3499 0 0 0 0 0 Magic spawn = 683 3096 3499 0 0 0 0 0 Ranger spawn = 549 3098 3499 0 0 0 0 0 Armour spawn = 2538 3098 3498 0 0 0 0 0 Pure spawn = 519 3098 3497 0 0 0 0 0 Skills spawn = 2258 3106 3560 0 0 0 0 0 Mage of zammy spawn = 599 3088 3496 0 1 0 0 0 Makeover Mage spawn = 1599 3086 3499 0 1 0 0 0 Slayer Master spawn = 2566 3087 3501 0 1 0 0 0 Skillcape spawn = 54 3987 3503 0 0 40 200 550 Dragon //end of
and there it is my dragon is at the bottom[/quote]
I just tried the coords on my server, and it leads me to a black area(not added in map). Are you sure you have the right coords?

Read full topic

item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

Ok, both of you shut up… so we can tlk bout what your here to tlk bout, thanks, oh and I only have one spawn-config file here ill post the whole section of the file where i posted it:

//edge spawns spawn = 1282 3084 3487 0 0 0 0 0 SALESMAN spawn = 541 3094 3499 0 0 0 0 0 Zeke spawn = 461 3097 3499 0 0 0 0 0 Magic spawn = 683 3096 3499 0 0 0 0 0 Ranger spawn = 549 3098 3499 0 0 0 0 0 Armour spawn = 2538 3098 3498 0 0 0 0 0 Pure spawn = 519 3098 3497 0 0 0 0 0 Skills spawn = 2258 3106 3560 0 0 0 0 0 Mage of zammy spawn = 599 3088 3496 0 1 0 0 0 Makeover Mage spawn = 1599 3086 3499 0 1 0 0 0 Slayer Master spawn = 2566 3087 3501 0 1 0 0 0 Skillcape spawn = 54 3987 3503 0 0 40 200 550 Dragon //end of

item.title: Why wont my edgewood destroying dragon appear?(PI)
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

[quote=“mrpyro3, post:4, topic:407428”][quote author=Thanks link=topic=508714.msg3690642#msg3690642 date=1312095162]
You sure do post in the help section a lot…

Which file are you doing this in…

Npc …or Spawn-config(i think thats right for pi)
[/quote]
Is posting here a lot not allowed? To my understanding that’s what the help section is for?
At OP, sometimes there are two spawn-config’s, make sure it’s posted in both.[/quote]

Did I say anything was wrong with it…no? Am I douchebag no… am I trying to be no…I was just saying a statement.
